reviews.text: Just a standard station not to be confused with the bigger New Cross Gate station nearby. Lifts Provide step free access here and trains can be frequent on most of the services that stop here.
Good connections to Lewisham, and the South East suburbs, ie: SouthEastern railway.
An acceptable station however far too few tap in and outs.
Love the area? discover its heritage

Well, where to begin? Who designed this bloody station? If I get off the mainline and need to validate my pass I have to walk all the way into the booking office to do this and then back to the Overground platform and by then the train may have gone and I've walked an unnecessary few hundred steps. 
And if I get off the Overground and want to get the mainline I have to walk all the way into the booking office and then back to the platform to validate and see what time my train is. Needs sorting. 
Also, New Cross is a dump and I want it relocated. 
Also, its always so dark here. 
Also, people who talk loudly on their mobile phones. 
Grrrr. 
apart from that its a nice stop.
